review_blob: On tap at Aidens Pub in Bristol, RI. The beer had a flat pour with minimal cream white head. The beer had a lovely amber color. The beer had a very sweet malty flavor with a creamy soft, almost flat, mouth feel with limited hop flavor. A decent beer, went well enough with Rhode Island clam chowder. Having had the beer in the bottle in was much worse on tap. There is a much more distinctive and noticeable hop flavor from the bottle.
